name: rock-smash
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user slugs the foe with a shattering punch. It can also smash cracked boulders.
flavor_text.platinum: The user slugs the foe with a shattering punch. It can also smash cracked boulders.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user hits with a punch that may lower the target’s Defense. It can also smash cracked boulders.
